rules.name: myRule_1
rules.label: Standard RT & Territory Is US/CANADA Annual revenue lessthan 1000$

rules.name: myRule_12
rules.label: Standard RT & Territory is EMEA & Annual Revenue is null or 0

rules.name: myRule_16
rules.label: Territory is EMEA ad Currency is GBP for other RTs

rules.name: myRule_20
rules.label: Territory is ANZ & All Anuual Revenue scenarios

rules.name: myRule_3
rules.label: Standard RT & Territory Is US/CANADA Annual Revenue greater $1000

rules.name: myRule_28
rules.label: Territory LATAM & for All RT scenarios

rules.name: myRule_32
rules.label: Standard RTs & Territory is Asia or DACH or Benelux

rules.name: myRule_5
rules.label: Standard RT & Territory Is US/CANADA Annual Revenue more than $1B

rules.name: myRule_7
rules.label: Standard RT & Territory Is US/CANADA Annual Revenue more than $1B

rules.name: myRule_9
rules.label: Government RT & Territory is US/CANADA, EMEA,ANZ,LATAM

Flow.description: every US/Canada territory do not update when the company is new

value.stringValue: IF(AND([Account].AnnualRevenue >0,NOT(ISNULL([Account].AnnualRevenue)),[Account].AnnualRevenue < 100000000),'SB', IF(AND([Account].AnnualRevenue >=100000000,[Account].AnnualRevenue <= 500000000),'MM', IF([Account].AnnualRevenue >500000000,'ENT', IF(AND(OR([Account].AnnualRevenue =0,ISNULL([Account].AnnualRevenue)),[Account].NumberOfEmployees >0,[Account].NumberOfEmployees <=999),'SB', IF(AND(OR([Account].AnnualRevenue =0,ISNULL([Account].AnnualRevenue)),[Account].NumberOfEmployees >= 1000),'ENT', IF(AND(OR([Account].AnnualRevenue =0,ISNULL([Account].AnnualRevenue)),OR([Account].NumberOfEmployees = 0,ISNULL([Account].NumberOfEmployees))),'UNK',''))))))

Flow.label: Update Company Market Segmentation
